title: Solomon Builds the Temple
summary: Solomon begins building the temple in the fourth year of his reign. The chapter details its dimensions, structure, and interior design. God affirms His covenant with Solomon, reminding him to remain faithful.

faq.question: When did Solomon begin building the temple?
faq.answer: In the fourth year of his reign over Israel.

faq.question: What did God remind Solomon during construction?
faq.answer: To walk in His ways, so He would dwell among His people.
